desc: I am a Web3, BlockChain Developer and Aspiring Data Scientist.  I am enhancing my knowledge with the latest development in the field of Data Science with focus on Machine Learning, Computer Vision and NLP. I am self-taught Full Stack Data Science Engineer from India. Exposure of working on Machine Learning, Computer Vision and NLP based projects. Possess a customer-centric & systems-driven approach to design business solutions. Efficient organiser, motivator, team player & the capability to motivate teams to excel & win. Following project life cycle methodology defined under the process framework; ensuring that customer deadlines are met within project budgets
